item.description:
Networking Extravaganza!

 

NHREIA Board Members will share tips for networking — then we’ll make sure you meet the right people!

 

Mark Dickey will discuss  Networking for Real Estate Investors.  He’ll cover:

· How to start and continue a conversation

· How to make connections, associations, and friendships with others

· Networking events and parties

· The Do’s and Don’ts of Networking

 

Dianne Shvanda will cover Social Media Networking.

 

Sherri Locke will conduct a workshop to help you Create Your Real Estate Investing Team.

 

Then, for the rest of the evening. . . use our blueprint for networking and connect with    others.  Bring lots of business cards!

 

Enjoy free pizza!  Provided by Barry Chisholm, Protection 1

 

NHREIA March Monthly Meeting  

6:30 pm, Wednesday August 10, 2011

Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Free for NHREIA members; only $20 for visitors and meetup members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
